sections.text:
The trail stretches ahead beneath a painted sky.

Each mile costs something—food, strength, or resolve. You watch your companions carefully, knowing not all of you may finish the journey.

choices.label: Press on despite the strain.
Slow the pace and care for the group.

sections.text:
The trail stretches ahead beneath a painted sky.

choices.label: Press on despite the strain.
Slow the pace and care for the group.

sections.text:
The journey ends beneath a wide and unforgiving sky.

Those lost along the trail are remembered by the land itself, their stories carried forward by anyone who survived long enough to tell them.

choices.label: Return to Main Menu
